  3. Even after the Baldur's Gate RPGs, BioWare vet says Dragon Age: The Veilguard was when the dev "finally said out loud" it's best at "telling stories through characters"  Gamesradar
  4. BioWare will be at SDCC with a brand-new look at Dragon Age 4 next week  TechRadar
  5. Dragon Age: The Veilguard did see Bioware take a "hard look at multiplayer", but eventually decide to stick to what it does best  VG247
